DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate patients who have coronary heart disease to determine if an investigational drug will further lower cholesterol when taken in combination with an approved cholesterol lowering medication.
DOC.brief_title: Investigational Drug Study in Patients With Elevated Cholesterol and Coronary Heart Disease (0653-801)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 10 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Patients with elevated cholesterol and coronary heart disease Patients who do not meet specific cholesterol levels as required by the study
